title: Your favorite champion just developed the ability to see through the 4th wall
body:
Your favorite champion just developed the ability to see the real world, and how they are viewed in-game, on the boards, in media, etc. What happens?
http://img.pandawhale.com/post-39520-scooby-doo-lets-see-where-this-u4kA.gif

replies.body:
{{champion:112}} quietly approves of the fact most people like him more than Jayce and are willing to acknowledge all the awesome things he's done without judging him too much.  Unfortunately his inability to interact with those on the other side means he generally ignores them and goes back to doing what he does.

{{champion:25}} {{champion:10}} realize not even the community can decide which of them is right and many people think both of them have valid points.  They wind up fighting even more.  Then one of them looks at DeviantArt, finds out they're usually shipped together, and both of them share a rare moment of agreement in how _wrong_ that is.

{{champion:102}} is amazed that she's actually rather popular given her status in-universe as a generally-hated outcast and approves of her usual depiction as an ass-kicking fire-breathing force of nature.  She's not sure what to make of everyone thinking she's hopelessly obsessed with J4 (though she admits he's very handsome).

The shyvana one is the closest to what I think she would act like. It seems I have no comment to make on this thread as it has already been made.

https://media.giphy.com/media/9g8PH1MbwTy4o/giphy.gif
{{champion:74}} Wait, did I trap myself in my own simulation again?

{{champion:82}} "You only need to click once, fool!"

... oh wait

> [{quoted}](name=IllumiNarnia,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=tYn37qzR,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-10-07T17:20:11.098+0000)
>
> {{champion:82}} "You only need to click once, fool!"
> 
> ... oh wait

RITO WHY YOU DO THIS T_T WHY HAVE YOU FORSAKEN OUR BROTHER AND LORD MORDERKAISER!!! T_T HUEHUEHUEHUEHUEHUE

Playing {{champion:35}}. You ult but only one Shaco reappears. Then you hear,

"Look... behind you."

{{champion:92}} :This'll be an easy wall jump.
I went there.
{{champion:62}} Tricks you into thinking you're playing the real Wukong but you aren't, he then proceeds to hit the enemy base from the other side of the map with his staff.

Damn Wukong, always monkeying around.
http://imagesmtv-a.akamaihd.net/uri/mgid:file:http:shared:mtv.com/news/wp-content/uploads/2015/01/natm-1420558782.gif
{{champion:25}} "Not all angels are good." Don't we have a religious text and Tumblr fandom to clarify that?

{{champion:103}} Discovers league pâ˜…rn











10/10

{{champion:62}} Would file a complaint to riot about how nerfed he is compared to the Wukong in the story "journey to the west". 
{{champion:62}}: COME ON RITO, That wukong can make his staff extend almost indefinitely, create clones out of every hair on his body, each of which can move independently while being just as strong as the real thing AND transform into 72 different forms... ;__;

**Riot**: ... sooo, tell us how to turn all that into 3 abilities, a passive and an ult without making it OP...
{{champion:62}} .__.
{{champion:92}} Why does everyone hate me ;_;
Nah, she's already pretty used to it. So she'll just try to prove herself harder so they can't ignore her.
but that will make everyone hate her more.
Which pretty much sums up her lore :)
Because your sword mirrors its owner :p
BECAUSE

Malzahar sees the vicious rumors about him having space aids.

He wonders if that is the reason no one really likes him, but only for a second.

He then tries to get the summoner to join his void cult.
{{champion:28}} Would use her small following of dedicated players to take revenge on every designer that has ever hurt her with nerfs.
{{champion:37}} {{champion:103}} Ahri probably wouldnt care about the media, sona would be embarrassed
She'd love the "Praise the Sun!" meme until she learned it was just a video game reference and people were not, in fact, praising the sun.
{{champion:107}} Meow
{{champion:157}}  This QQ over my walls, not even my Q stacks can beat it.

{{champion:85}}  The eyes never lie. 

I saw someone in worlds almost choose me..  (Seriously they chose him, then went on to choose. someone else..) 

A silent death will come.
He was chosen once or twice, can't remember the games. Think he was in AHQ vs IG.
*Gasp* Really?! :o

Yeah, as support with a kalista. 

Kitties play it on IG in a win vs AHQ.

I think there was another one, but I am not sure.
he can supp a kalista? :D
almost anyone can support kalista and it can work. that's what makes her cool.
{{champion:119}}  Needs more Draaaaaaaaven
{{champion:86}} "Guys, I've been able to do %98 of the shit you complain about better BEFORE I was reworked. Why do you complain now?"

Interesting thing is, if I can get my butt moving on my fanfiction, my main chara actually traverses other realities once thought to just be the worlds of fiction.  Eventually, he will reach Runeterra and...show them this game, so...

{{champion:37}}:  *speaking telepathically*  (Anthony, why does everyone want to see my butt?)
{{champion:17}}:  *sobs quietly in the most adorable means possible...Annie comes in and hugs him*

*sighs*  Sorry about that, Teemo.  Unfortunately, most of the hate is due to you being a mite OP in some games.

{{champion:2}}:  Anthony...who are these Minnesota Vikings, and why is their mascot who looks like me named Viktor?
{{champion:112}}:  Wait...WHAT?!?
{{champion:51}}:  Hold on...I got beaten out for best sniper on this Green Scorpion's list by some Aussie idiot?
{{champion:53}}:  WHY...DO...PEOPLE...WANT...ME...TO...CONSTANTLY...DANCE...THE...MACARENA?
{{champion:45}}:  Um...you seem to like this "Final Boss" skin.  What's with this comment about all the memes, though?
{{champion:122}}:  I don't even like basketball, but if I could really do that with the ball...
{{champion:161}} *smell of burnt flesh*

{{champion:33}} meh

{{champion:421}} RAHHHHH *eats everything*
add {{champion:31}} and {{champion:96}} to the reksai one then yea
Rek'Sai is more badass though
yea i know its just the whole they eat everything in game/lore as it is
{{champion:133}} RIP in peace. Would be extremely disappointed with herself
;) every female champ would go back into the game if they aknowledge of rule34 ;)
Nothing because nobody says anything about my bby unless we're talkin DJ {{champion:37}}  {{item:3070}}

{{champion:29}} OH hiya twitch, hows it hangin, what u doing with that cask huh, no  i wouldnt want an arrow through my head haha funny rat, what do u mean u got more mutagen in that cask, no please dont thro.... mutates. twitch -.-
{{champion:50}} It seems none of them understand my true potential.

{{champion:432}} 

He wouldn't act any differently...
{{champion:67}} : Why am I, of all people, the evil one here?!
{{champion:154}} "No one remembers that I exist :("
